message.body: Are you coming to Bryn Mawr today? I have a hug for you!
Yes I am! I need to finish a stupid PowerPoint for a class at one
That sounds fun! And by fun I mean not. Where are you? Want a Danish?
I'm still driving. It's not going to be fun at all, it's the paper I asked for an extension on. Still don't know what it's about haha
That sounds like my relationship to chemistry
I've just "decided" that this is the class I'm going to blame everything in my life on
"Well you see professor, these chemicals really like these chemicals...why? Oh I couldn't say but when they get together cool stuff happens; let me draw you a picture."
